resources.string: By signing in, you agree to our.Terms and Condition
Create new Account for Login? Sign up
Please provide your registered email id send the password reset link
Send Otp on your register mobile number
You are scheduled to be online on
Are you sure you want to go online?

The website is an internet-based portal having existence on the World Wide Web, Applications, and other electronic mediums which provide astrological content. The website is offering ‘Free services’ and ‘Paid Services’ too. Free services are easy to access. And for paid services, you will have to become a member. And to become a member, you will have to register for our paid services. There is an agreement for members who want to get access to services.In order to reach the website, there are some ways to reach it smoothly. Providing correct information and giving the proper guidance to the customers is necessary. Therefore, we provide the information related to the website and register the website. For registration, there is some information that will be applicable to the customers for new registration. This process includes personal information like; email address, contact number, bank account details, and many more in terms of providing the services set by the website. In terms of getting you connected with us and you want to get connected with us, the Privacy policy of this website includes all the personal information of the user/customer. The website makes sure that the information provided by the customer/user is correct and relevant for becoming a member. Also, visit…… Talk to Astrologers Customers/users should know about? The information provided by the customer/user to the website is disposable to the third party if needed in serious issues. The website cannot give the commitment of keeping all the personal and communicative details according to the privacy policy of the website.Even though we commit to protecting the information provided by you, we cannot promise you. Being a user of the information will remain secure as you register to the website and your consent is taken during the registration process. Clicking on Agree button sets the lock for your personal information so that the third party cannot open it. The website is not responsible for medical advice. If provided by a third party or service provider and astrologers on the site. An astrologer does not provide you with specific tests, treatments, and medicines. Bank details (Credit card/Debit card) The website is allowing access to the user who has registered to the account and is provided with the information. Therefore, users give consent to unconditional access to the account by the website, agents, employees, or authorized person. For the purpose of addressing the complaints, abuse, and violation of rights the website has the authority to have an investigation and action with the help of available records.\n The user is directed to use the Terms and conditions of the Privacy Policy.Also, visit…. Thearchryamukti.com Contact Information and ProcessThe website is providing such services which are available through the medium of telecommunication with the Astrologers who are listed in the website. By agreeing with the current Terms and conditions on usage, you are naturally giving your unconditional consent to the website to arrange the call with you on your cell phone number or DND service provider number. User’s consent Once you access the website and start using it, clicking on ‘I AGREE’ will show that you are agreeing to all the terms and conditions of the website. If you are not agreeing with the terms and conditions of the website, do not press or click on the ‘I Agree’ button. Once you click you will be shown all the terms and conditions of the website. The page will open.
Discontinuation
The website may discontinue, modify, change or send alerts to the services or the account of a user registered with the website. The website may issue or may not issue the notice or provide any reason for such actions taken by the website. The website reserves right to terminate and initiate actions immediately.
Also, visit…. Talk to astrologers
Select the date and time when \nyou will come online again.
You can email us at above mentioned id
We are available Monday to Saturday
(India Standard Time) from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m.

string-array.name: text_info
string-array.item: Follow the steps given below and Find Answers to your Questions

string-array.name: text_desc
string-array.item: Step 1- Go to the Home page and click on Menu on the Pro App and Click on ‘My Earnings’ Step 2- Once you click on My Earnings, the page will open and you will be able to find your earnings according to the consultations for a specific date and time you will have to click on the filter applied for the search process.

When you click on the ‘Account’ in the Menu, the Account page will open for your guidance. Account details are filled in on the website once an Astrologer has done the process of registering I the website/App. Only a registered Astrologer is allowed to view the details of the account created by the website / Application. Astrologers are not allowed to use the same identity information for registering on the other application/ Website. Strict action will be taken if found using the identity information for other sign inns as per the terms and conditions of the Website/an Application.

Once you open the page called ‘Payment’ you will automatically get access to see the details related to the payments. An Astrologer who is registered to the certain website/Application can access the payment related details provided by the service provider All payment-related details and your earnings will be shown and explained in the payment box. Taking an extra payment, Asking for unnecessary money and other restrictions are not allowed by an Astrologer according to the terms and conditions of the website/Application.

Click on the option called ‘Book an Appointment’ the page will open for the details related to Booking an appointment. An Astrologer who is registered is allowed to access the page ‘Book an Appointment’ booked by the client. Astrologers should check the appointment schedules and plan for a session accordingly on regular basis. In case the appointment is missed and it led to bad reviews for the website/Application, strict action will be taken according to the terms and conditions of the website/Application.

Once you click on the option that says ‘Chat with Astrologers’ it will take you to the page directly Chat with Astrologers platform is created to have a chat with the needy client through the website. An astrologer should have chat with the client for the duration has been given. Astrologers should not chat with the person on chat with the unmatched details of a client. Strict action will be taken in case found having an unnecessary conversation on chat, false language on chat, forming a personal relationship through chat, spreading unwanted information, etc. Access is provided to the registered Astrologers with correct information. Actions will be taken if found ruining the above restrictions.

Click on the ‘Call Astrologers’ page will take you to the Call related information provided by the website or an Application. A registered Astrologer is allowed to access the calls from the clients. An Astrologer can finish the session within provided time duration by the service provider/website/Application An Astrologer is not allowed to have long conversations and out-of-the-box conversations with the client. Relevant information should be provided to the client by Astrologers. I found strict action will be taken according to the terms and conditions of the website/Application provided by the service provider.

Our Application/Website is the best quality in service providing. The quality of the website should be maintained by the Astrologers who have access to these Applications created by the service provider of the website. Any bad effects related to the quality of services will be considered inhalation of the terms and conditions of the website/Application.
